title: Wave 14: Arena Mode and Plan Mode
description: Windsurf released version 1.9544.24 on January 30, 2026, introducing Arena Mode for side-by-side model comparison with voting capabilities and personal/global leaderboards. Also added Plan Mode for implementation planning before coding, and admin controls for default model settings across teams.

title: Enterprise Features and Bug Fixes (v1.13.12-1.13.14)
description: Released January 25-27, 2026, adding enterprise command auto-execution allow/deny lists for admins, post_setup_worktree hook support, improved diff zones performance, and critical bug fixes for disconnected cascades and commit message generation.

title: Version 0.26.0 with Agent Skills Launch
description: Gemini CLI released version 0.26.0 around January 26, 2026, officially launching Agent Skills for extending functionality with specialized capabilities. Includes significant performance improvements, PDF token estimation fixes, and core stability enhancements.

community_feedback.quote: Agent Skills and Hooks, LFG!!! ðŸš€

title: Version 0.93.0 with SOCKS5 Proxy Support
description: OpenAI released Codex CLI version 0.93.0 on January 31, 2026, adding optional SOCKS5 proxy listener with policy enforcement and config gating. Plan mode now streams proposed changes.

title: Version 1.40.0 Bug Fix Release
description: Continue.dev released version 1.40.0 on January 31, 2026, fixing tokenizers and adding missing cancelStream call for non-retryable errors. Daily beta releases continue with 7-day promotion cycle to stable.

title: January 21, 2026 Platform Updates
description: Devin released minor bug fixes and performance improvements on January 21, 2026. Also added v3 API Queue endpoint (GET /v3beta1/) and Slack integration for updates.
